post:
Get going guys.. Free hosting form duckla.com

Promo URL : [http://ser4.duckla.com](http://ser4.duckla.com)

You will get a free hosting account with unmeter storage space and bandwidth ... which is suitable for someone who want to have a Blog or something else.

You can choose the Free plan and Subdomain([hkkl.ml](http://hkkl.ml) wich is stand for Hong Kong  - Kowloon) for register.

No coupon code require. 

Although No support will be given for Free Webhosting , but if you need help for install a Wordpress Blog on your site , please feel free to send a email to Support@movemyblog.duckla.com with your username after registeration.

Have Fun.

 [duckla.com ](http://duckla.com)
